DOC.brief_summary: The overall aim of this study is to develop and test a psychodynamic Internet-delivered psychological treatment for patients with mild to moderate major depression and compare its efficacy to an active control group.
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of Major Depressive Disorder 15 or more on MADRSS Severe depression (more than 35 on MADRSS or based on interview) Severe psychiatric condition (e.g. psychosis or bipolar disorder) Suicidal (measured in diagnostic interview) Changed medication during the last three months
